name: Production Checklist
description: Before taking your Next.js application to production, there are some optimizations and patterns you should consider implementing for the best user experience, performance, and security.
author: Vercel Docs

name: Introducing Spend Management
description: Serverless infrastructure can instantly and infinitely scale. While powerful, this has had tradeoffs. An unforced error or traffic spike could cause an unexpected bill.
author: Lee Robinson - Vercel

name: Guide to fast websites with Nextjs
description: Tips for maximizing server speeds and minimizing client burden
author: Seif Ghezala - Tinloof
